title: Ticket #6509: ConvertDefaultIpToSocketIp() is slower than it needs to be
description: ConvertDefaultIpToSocketIp() only does anything aside from write log messages if the undocumented knob SHARED_PORT_ADDRESS_REWRITING is set. We should find out if that can be removed (see tickets #4848 and #4849). Otherwise, we can certainly optimize the function by checking for it first, and for the various debug flags if we decide to keep caring about them.
remarks: See #6518.
creator: tlmiller
